taskbody.context: To install using the Windows installer:

step.cmd: Make sure that your system meets the system requirements listed above.
Download the Windows installer ( for the 32-bit version, for the 64-bit version) and run it.
Follow the instructions presented in the installation program.
Start using one of the following methods:

choices.choice: Using one of the short cuts created by the installer.
By running oxygen.batoxygenAuthor.batoxygenDeveloper.batsyncroSVNClient.bat, which is located in the install folder.

step.cmd: To license your copy of go to Help Register... to enter your license key.
